introduction: The following passage is adapted from Economies of Scale by Damien Ware (2022).
text: Small businesses can sometimes compete effectively with large corporations by specializing in niche markets. This strategy, though risky, ______ entrepreneurs to carve out loyal customer bases with minimal overhead.
question: Which choice completes the text so that it conforms to the conventions of Standard English? Focus on verb tense and subject-verb agreement for describing current business strategies.
explanation: Choice B is correct. The singular subject This strategy requires the singular verb allows, in line with the present context. A have allowed is plural. C allow is also plural. D allowed is past tense, which clashes with the ongoing nature of the statement.
